descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content:
Considering the volume of daily meetings happening between Novartis associates today, there is an opportunity to be more efficient with overall Meeting management Planning, managing and tracking information across various meetings.

Teams provides basic note taking capabilities, but it needs to be further extended with utilities to optimize overall meeting management by individuals. This solution fills this gap.

This cannot only improve productivity but also increases MS Teams adoption

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
The proposed solution will leverage SPFx based App hosted on MS Teams tab, which have interactive interface to create and manage meetings in MS teams.

Scheduling a meeting:

  • Along with OOTB meeting scheduling features, there will be option to track Meeting agenda as metadata. All the relevant notes/action items can be tracked against the Agenda.
  • Attachments are stored in OneDrive for Business so that large files can also be added as part of meeting invite
  • The tool generates a well-formatted and structured email invite containing all the meeting details that is sent to the meeting participants.

Join a Meeting:

  • The meeting participant has a one-stop access to relevant meeting information like participants, meeting agenda and reference material upfront in a structured and organized manner for ease of use
  • As a meeting participant, the tool provides an option to co-author meeting notes. The tool also provides user with a voice-assisted feature to capture meeting notes for ease of use. User also has the option to organize meeting minutes by agenda for effective circulation and tracking
  • With an single click host can publishes the meeting minutes to all participants that receive the minutes in a formatted and structured email containing all the meeting details
  • All action items and their status get tracked centrally in Planner
